JFXMaze - Standalone Distribution
================================

How to run:
1. Make sure Java 11 or higher is installed on your system
2. Double-click "run_jfxmaze_standalone.bat" to start the game

Requirements:
- Java JDK/JRE 11 or higher
- Windows 10/11

Troubleshooting:
- If you get "Java not found" error, install Java from https://adoptium.net/
- If the game doesn't start, try running from command prompt to see error messages

Distribution Contents:
- JFXMaze-1.0-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar (main game)
- javafx/lib/ (JavaFX runtime libraries)
- run_jfxmaze_standalone.bat (launcher script)

Created on: Per 29.05.2025 11:34:04,29
